sentences.en: A regional conflict would erupt into violent warfare.
sentences.cn: 地区性冲突会演变成一场大战.

sentences.en: Can you recap the points included in the regional conference proposal?
sentences.cn: 你能扼要说明一下地区会议上提案的重点吗？

sentences.en: Colleges may be accredited by regional associations.
sentences.cn: 学会是否合格可由地区各协会作出鉴定.

sentences.en: It is a federation of 10 regional unions.
sentences.cn: 它是由十个地方工会结合成的联合会.

sentences.en: Many people in Minnesota and Tennessee have noticeable regional accents.
sentences.cn: 明尼苏达州和田纳西州的许多人都有明显的地区口音。

sentences.en: Regional accents are still acceptable but there is to be a blitz on incorrect grammar.
sentences.cn: 地方口音还可以接受，但要下大力气纠正语法错误。

sentences.en: Regional monopolies were bitterly fought for.
sentences.cn: 为夺取地方垄断权发生了激烈的竞争.
农耕方式的地区性差异

sentences.en: The difference in regional house prices acts as an obstacle to mobility of labour.
sentences.cn: 不同地区房价的差异阻碍了劳动力的流动.

sentences.en: The recent fighting in the area could ignite regional passions far beyond the borders.
sentences.cn: 最近该地区的战斗可能激发边境以外整个地区的激动情绪。

sentences.en: There are now 400 staff at headquarters, servicing our regional and overseas work.
sentences.cn: 现在总部有400名职员负责地区和海外事务。

sentences.en: This regional bloc has fallen apart.
sentences.cn: 这一地区性集团已土崩瓦解.

sentences.en: We decentralised our operations last year and opened several regional offices.
sentences.cn: 去年我们分散了业务,开设了几个地方办事处.

sentences.en: We have a buoyant economy and unemployment is considerably lower than the regional average.
sentences.cn: 我们经济繁荣，失业率远低于地区平均水平。

sentences.en: We should take an active part in regional economic exchanges and cooperation.
sentences.cn: 积极参与区域经济交流和合作.

words.tran_cn: 地方主义；地区性；地区特征；行政区域划分
地方主义作家；地方主义者
地区的；局部的；整个地区的

phrases.tran_cn: 地区办事处；区域性公司
区域规划；区域计划；区域计尽
区域销售经理；地区销售经理

trans.tran_cn: 地区的，区域的，特定区域的，特定地区的，方言的，区域性
trans.tran_en: relating to a particular region or area
